resources.string: How often the synchronisation task should run (in minutes). The minimum value is 15 minutes.
Specifies a name for the file.
A description that will be displayed within the self-service portal.
The profile is not visible in the self-service portal..
Specifies the url from which the file is downloaded.
Specifies the local file path to which the file is downloaded.

Specify how the rule should be enforced. Available offers self-service through the app GUI. Create creates the file if it does not exist. Compliant creates the file and overwrites it when the file hash does not equal the configured hash.
Provide a file hash that can be used to validate the compliance and integrity of the downloaded file. This value is required when using the Compliant Intent.
A Base64 encoded image file that will be displayed as icon. Leave blank to show a default icon.
Collection of Base64 file profiles. You can use Base64 for in-configuration files that are small in size.
A Base64 profile. You need to provide base64 content.
